name: Method
description: The Method class describes the methodology used by the intruder to perpetrate the events of the incident.  This class consists of a list of references describing the attack method and a free form description of the technique.

Reference.name: Reference
Reference.description: A reference to a vulnerability, malware sample, advisory, or analysis of an attack technique.

Description.name: Description
Description.description: A free-form text description of the methodology used by the intruder.

AdditionalData.name: AdditionalData
AdditionalData.description: A mechanism by which to extend the data model.

restriction.name: restriction
restriction.description: This attribute is defined in Section 3.2.
